content:
Here is the link for moving a profile in Windows when installed in default location: 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/moving-thunderbird-data-to-a-new-computer

here is the info in brief steps:

  1. ensure thunderbird is NOT running on old machine
  2. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  3. this should open windows file explorer in Appdata\roaming folder
  4. highlight the Thunderbird folder and copy to external media
  5. ensure thunderbird is installed on second computer and NOT running
  6. enter %appdata% in search window on task bar and press Enter key
  7. you should be in Appdata\roaming folder , copy&paste the exported Thunderbird folder there. This may prompt to overwrite an existing folder of same name. allow it
  8. start thunderbird and all should be there
creator: davidsk

content: Generally you remove old account and that ends the requests to get new mail. But doing so will affect any mail stored in Thunderbird under that address. You need to move it elsewhere before you remove the account (like Thunderbird local folders)

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

content:
Ak máte ešte prístup k starému Thunderbirdu s poštou, tak odporúčam tento postup: Zo starého PROFILU Thunderbirdu prekopírujte do nového PROFILU Thunderbirdu celý priečinok Mail (Ak mate prístup POP3) a priečinok ImapMail (ak mate prístup IMAP). Tam je všetko to čo potrebujete - všetka pošta a nastavenie účtov. Takto mate teraz skopírovanú poštu a nastavenia účtov. Pokiaľ spustite Thunderbird, tak uvidíte späť svoju starú poštu. C:\Users\<Windows user name>\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\<Profile name>\ http://kb.mozillazine.org/Profile_folder_-_Thunderbird#Windows_Vista.2C_7.2C_8.1_and_10

K spokojnosti teraz chýbajú iba KONTAKTY V prípade, že máte ešte prístup k starému Thunderbirdu so starým profilomm tak v starom Thunderbirde: Thunderbird - Nástroje - Adresár - Nástroje - EXPORT - a vytvoriť si súbor *.ldif a potom v novom Thunderbirde Thunderbird - Nástroje - Adresár - Nástroje - IMPORT - Adresáre a tu mu ponúknuť ten vytvorený *.ldif súbor.

content: It may be that it needs to be downloaded and installed. is the old computer still available? if so, it will be simpler to copy from there. My concern isn't THunderbird, as that can be readily downloaded; the issue is whether your profile was safely transferred. if you don't want to repeat the transfer, look at c:\users\<yourid>\appdata\roaming to see if there is a thunderbird folder. You can download and install thunderbird from https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/all/ - be sure to pick the desired version.
creator: davidsk

content: Mozilla and outlook are different. You may have an icon for a downloaded thunderbird that is not installed. The wizard is to set up an email account, not install thunderbird. can you create a screenshot of what you have? That will probably help resolve your concerns. thank you
